result.title: Citizens Financial Group Has Turned The Corner
result.text: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. reported strong Q3 results, with revenues up 11.6% year-over-year and net income rising to $457 million. CFG saw sequential growth in both deposits and loans for the second consecutive quarter, signaling a reversal of previous declines. Asset quality improved, with lower net charge-offs and a higher net interest margin, supporting stronger earnings and efficiency ratios.

result.title: Citizens Financial Group: Strong NIM Trajectory Supports Shares
result.text: Citizens Financial Group delivered strong Q3 earnings, increased its dividend, and continues to benefit from its pivot to private banking. CFG's net interest margin is expanding as fixed-rate swaps roll off, positioning the bank for above-peer earnings growth next year. Credit quality and capital remain solid, with well-reserved office loan exposure and a CET1 ratio above 10%, supporting ongoing capital returns.
